name: A Short Story (Garage_Heathen)
description:
In this game you play as a car mechanic from Nizhnevartovsk set on writing a short story

English language is supported as well as Russian

Special thanks to nerisuyu for testing the game <3

 

Credits:

Music, coding, art and story - Garage Heathen

Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • LMB to interact
  • Any keyboard key to type
How to Install:

Just unpack the zip file and you are ready to play

If you would like to support me, consider buying the full soundtrack to the game!

Also consider visiting my page in vk: https://vk.com/club178312397

Tell me what you think!
